For dual axle caravans choose the wheel measuring point midway between both wheels.
Please select span length in your chosen units from wheel to wheel as shown above.
Please select span length in your chosen units from wheel to jockey wheel as shown above.\n For dual axle caravans choose the wheel measuring point midway between both wheels.
Please select units you will use to measure your caravan span. Select either millimeters or inches.
Ensure vehicle with installed device is on level ground before you proceed.
To access settings you need to be connected to SavvyLevel device
Are you sure that you want to continue?
Are you sure you want to clear the error code?
Please press & hold for at least 2 seconds
Are you sure you want to clear hitch?
Follow the help desk instruction and report the value in the ‘Error Code’ box below (exactly as written). If you accidentally entered here just press cancel.
Nearest device will be shown first
By tapping on Scan Device, you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions.

You can zoom-in/zoom-out by clicking this button
Zooming in will indicate the wheel that is down
Ramp the wheel that SavvyLevel shows as down
Drive forward up the ramp until level (you can reverse up the ramp also)
You can set/release the hitch height marker with a long press of this button
This is indicates battery voltage not phone battery
This icon represents SavvyLevel\'s signal strength and connectivity
This button is used to record your preferred level - you can change this at anytime (your level is remembered even when the unit is powered off)
Enable this switch to provide correction height values required to achieve perfect level in your chosen units
Enable this switch to provide the voltage powering the SavvyLevel unit
Turn On Bluetooth to Allow "SavvyCV4" to Connect to Accessories
In order to utilize the Bluetooth scanning feature of this application, it is necessary to enable Bluetooth on your device. Please ensure that Bluetooth is turned on to access this functionality.

In addition to enabling Bluetooth, location access must also be granted in order to use the Bluetooth scanning feature of this application. Please ensure that location access is enabled to fully utilize this functionality. \n\n Go to settings > permissions > allow location access while using app
